_header: That passing goodness the root of all virtue
_description: Verses written to his Mistress, the flower of womanhood, a love epistle — six stanzas rhyme royal including Envoy

Lam306.First Lines:
That pasaunt Goodnes the Rote of all vertveWhiche Rotide is in
                    youre femynete…
Lam306.Last Lines:
…Say it is hire olde loli þat loueth hire so fre
                    trewehire louynge a lone not schanginge for no newe
Lam306.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
